ygData.subject: Re: Bard Songs Stacking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Whenever I grouped with another bard higher than me, his/her songs always took over the same ones I was singing.  The stats would slightly increase as
ygData.messageBody:
>I suspect that other Bard songs probably don't stack,
>either, like the heal song. Anyone else test this?

Whenever I grouped with another bard higher than me, his/her
songs always took over the same ones I was singing. The stats
would slightly increase as their song pulsed over mine. I havent
tested it recently, but Hymm never did stack. You got two
messages and two graphicals, but the hp went up as fast as
one bard singing it. Now, I'm not sure if one bard starts
Hymm, and another stronger voice tries to sing Hymm, if the
client is smart enough to turn off the previous one in favor
of the new stronger heal. I imagine it does, since other songs
behave this way.

This weekend, two groups of level 40-45 killed the ghoul lord
a few times and pulled SSotY and SSB. I played a pretty nice
role as the only bard in the 12 people there. Dinged into 39,
and got my pretty graphical spam particle effects.

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
